found.description: Indicates if the requested object was found or not

entity_type.description: Shows the currenty category of entity it is searched in.

found.description: Indicates if the requested object was found or not

result.description: This object carries the search result

entity_id.description: The id used to search this query.

anyOf.description: GET request that returns address balances
anyOf.title: AddressStxBalanceResponse

lock_tx_id.description: The transaction where the lock event occurred. Empty if no tokens are locked.

locked.description: The amount of locked STX, as string quoted micro-STX. Zero if no tokens are locked.

lock_height.description: The STX chain block height of when the lock event occurred. Zero if no tokens are locked.

burnchain_lock_height.description: The burnchain block height of when the lock event occurred. Zero if no tokens are locked.

burnchain_unlock_height.description: The burnchain block height of when the tokens unlock. Zero if no tokens are locked.

total_locked.description: Micro-STX amount still locked at current block height.

total_unlocked.description: Micro-STX amount unlocked at current block height.

items.description: Unlock schedule amount and block height
items.title: AddressUnlockSchedule

amount.description: Micro-STX amount locked at this block height.

found.description: Indicates if the requested object was found or not

result.description: This object carries the search result

entity_id.description: The id used to search this query.

block_data.description: Returns basic search result information about the requested id

canonical.description: If the block lies within the canonical chain

hash.description: Refers to the hash of the block

canonical.description: Set to `true` if block corresponds to the canonical chain tip

index_block_hash.description: The only hash that can uniquely identify an anchored block or an unconfirmed state trie

burn_block_time.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when this block was mined.

burn_block_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) indicating when this block was mined.

burn_block_hash.description: Hash of the anchor chain block

burn_block_height.description: Height of the anchor chain block

parent_microblock_hash.description: The hash of the last streamed block that precedes this block to which this block is to be appended. Not every anchored block will have a parent microblock stream. An anchored block that does not have a parent microblock stream has the parent microblock hash set to an empty string, and the parent microblock sequence number set to -1.

parent_microblock_sequence.description: The hash of the last streamed block that precedes this block to which this block is to be appended. Not every anchored block will have a parent microblock stream. An anchored block that does not have a parent microblock stream has the parent microblock hash set to an empty string, and the parent microblock sequence number set to -1.

txs.description: List of transactions included in the block

items.description: Transaction ID

microblocks_accepted.description: List of microblocks that were accepted in this anchor block. Not every anchored block will have a accepted all (or any) of the previously streamed microblocks. Microblocks that were orphaned are not included in this list.

items.description: Microblock hash

microblocks_streamed.description: List of microblocks that were streamed/produced by this anchor block's miner. This list only includes microblocks that were accepted in the following anchor block. Microblocks that were orphaned are not included in this list.

items.description: Microblock hash

microblock_tx_count.description: List of txs counts in each accepted microblock

found.description: Indicates if the requested object was found or not

result.description: This object carries the search result

entity_id.description: The id used to search this query.

tx_data.description: Returns basic search result information about the requested id

canonical.description: If the transaction lies within the canonical chain

block_hash.description: Refers to the hash of the block for searched transaction

anyOf.title: MempoolTransaction
anyOf.description: Describes all transaction types on Stacks 2.0 blockchain

anyOf.title: MempoolTokenTransferTransaction
anyOf.description: Describes representation of a Type-0 Stacks 2.0 transaction. https://github.com/blockstack/stacks-blockchain/blob/master/sip/sip-005-blocks-and-transactions.md#type-0-transferring-an-asset

allOf.title: AbstractMempoolTransaction
allOf.description: Abstract transaction. This schema makes up all properties common between all Stacks 2.0 transaction types

allOf.title: BaseTransaction
allOf.description: Transaction properties that are available from a raw serialized transactions. These are available for transactions in the mempool as well as mined transactions.

nonce.description: Used for ordering the transactions originating from and paying from an account. The nonce ensures that a transaction is processed at most once. The nonce counts the number of times an account's owner(s) have authorized a transaction. The first transaction from an account will have a nonce value equal to 0, the second will have a nonce value equal to 1, and so on.

fee_rate.description: Transaction fee as Integer string (64-bit unsigned integer).

sponsored.description: Denotes whether the originating account is the same as the paying account

items.title: PostCondition
items.description: Post-conditionscan limit the damage done to a user's assets

condition_code.title: PostConditionFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A fungible condition code encodes a statement being made for either STX or a fungible token, with respect to the originating account.

condition_code.title: PostConditionFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A fungible condition code encodes a statement being made for either STX or a fungible token, with respect to the originating account.

condition_code.title: PostConditionNonFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A non-fungible condition code encodes a statement being made about a non-fungible token, with respect to whether or not the particular non-fungible token is owned by the account.

anchor_mode.title: TransactionAnchorModeType
anchor_mode.description: `on_chain_only`: the transaction MUST be included in an anchored block, `off_chain_only`: the transaction MUST be included in a microblock, `any`: the leader can choose where to include the transaction.

receipt_time.description: A unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when the transaction broadcast was received by the node.

receipt_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when the transaction broadcast was received by the node.

allOf.title: TokenTransferTransactionMetadata
allOf.description: Metadata associated with token-transfer type transactions

amount.description: Transfer amount as Integer string (64-bit unsigned integer)

memo.description: Hex encoded arbitrary message, up to 34 bytes length (should try decoding to an ASCII string)

data.description: Hex encoded 32-byte scratch space for block leader's use

allOf.title: AbstractTransaction
allOf.description: Anchored transaction metadata. All mined/anchored Stacks transactions have these properties.

allOf.title: BaseTransaction
allOf.description: Transaction properties that are available from a raw serialized transactions. These are available for transactions in the mempool as well as mined transactions.

nonce.description: Used for ordering the transactions originating from and paying from an account. The nonce ensures that a transaction is processed at most once. The nonce counts the number of times an account's owner(s) have authorized a transaction. condition_code.title: PostConditionFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A fungible condition code encodes a statement being made for either STX or a fungible token, with respect to the originating account.

condition_code.title: PostConditionFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A fungible condition code encodes a statement being made for either STX or a fungible token, with respect to the originating account.

condition_code.title: PostConditionNonFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A non-fungible condition code encodes a statement being made about a non-fungible token, with respect to whether or not the particular non-fungible token is owned by the account.

anchor_mode.title: TransactionAnchorModeType
anchor_mode.description: `on_chain_only`: the transaction MUST be included in an anchored block, `off_chain_only`: the transaction MUST be included in a microblock, `any`: the leader can choose where to include the transaction.

block_hash.description: Hash of the blocked this transactions was associated with

block_height.description: Height of the block this transactions was associated with

burn_block_time.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when this block was mined

burn_block_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when this block was mined.

parent_burn_block_time.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when this parent block was mined

parent_burn_block_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when this parent block was mined.

canonical.description: Set to `true` if block corresponds to the canonical chain tip

tx_index.description: Index of the transaction, indicating the order. Starts at `0` and increases with each transaction

tx_result.description: Result of the transaction. For contract calls, this will show the value returned by the call. For other transaction types, this will return a boolean indicating the success of the transaction.

hex.description: Hex string representing the value fo the transaction result

repr.description: Readable string of the transaction result

is_unanchored.description: True if the transaction is included in a microblock that has not been confirmed by an anchor block.

microblock_hash.description: The microblock hash that this transaction was streamed in. If the transaction was batched in an anchor block (not included within a microblock) then this value will be an empty string.

microblock_sequence.description: The microblock sequence number that this transaction was streamed in. If the transaction was batched in an anchor block (not included within a microblock) then this value will be 2147483647 (0x7fffffff, the max int32 value), this value preserves logical transaction ordering on (block_height, microblock_sequence, tx_index).

microblock_canonical.description: Set to `true` if microblock is anchored in the canonical chain tip, `false` if the transaction was orphaned in a micro-fork.

anyOf.title: TransactionEventSmartContractLog
anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

allOf.title: BaseTransaction
allOf.description: Transaction properties that are available from a raw serialized transactions. These are available for transactions in the mempool as well as mined transactions.

nonce.description: Used for ordering the transactions originating from and paying from an account. The nonce ensures that a transaction is processed at most once. The nonce counts the number of times an account's owner(s) have authorized a transaction. The first transaction from an account will have a nonce value equal to 0, the second will have a nonce value equal to 1, and so on.

fee_rate.description: Transaction fee as Integer string (64-bit unsigned integer).

sponsored.description: Denotes whether the originating account is the same as the paying account

items.title: PostCondition
items.description: Post-conditionscan limit the damage done to a user's assets

condition_code.title: PostConditionFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A fungible condition code encodes a statement being made for either STX or a fungible token, with respect to the originating account.

condition_code.title: PostConditionFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A fungible condition code encodes a statement being made for either STX or a fungible token, with respect to the originating account.

condition_code.title: PostConditionNonFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A non-fungible condition code encodes a statement being made about a non-fungible token, with respect to whether or not the particular non-fungible token is owned by the account.

anchor_mode.title: TransactionAnchorModeType
anchor_mode.description: `on_chain_only`: the transaction MUST be included in an anchored block, `off_chain_only`: the transaction MUST be included in a microblock, `any`: the leader can choose where to include the transaction.

block_hash.description: Hash of the blocked this transactions was associated with

block_height.description: Height of the block this transactions was associated with

burn_block_time.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when this block was mined

burn_block_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when this block was mined.

parent_burn_block_time.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when this parent block was mined

parent_burn_block_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when this parent block was mined.

canonical.description: Set to `true` if block corresponds to the canonical chain tip

tx_index.description: Index of the transaction, indicating the order. Starts at `0` and increases with each transaction

tx_result.description: Result of the transaction. For contract calls, this will show the value returned by the call. For other transaction types, this will return a boolean indicating the success of the transaction.

hex.description: Hex string representing the value fo the transaction result

repr.description: Readable string of the transaction result

is_unanchored.description: True if the transaction is included in a microblock that has not been confirmed by an anchor block.

microblock_hash.description: The microblock hash that this transaction was streamed in. If the transaction was batched in an anchor block (not included within a microblock) then this value will be an empty string.

microblock_sequence.description: The microblock sequence number that this transaction was streamed in. If the transaction was batched in an anchor block (not included within a microblock) then this value will be 2147483647 (0x7fffffff, the max int32 value), this value preserves logical transaction ordering on (block_height, microblock_sequence, tx_index).

microblock_canonical.description: Set to `true` if microblock is anchored in the canonical chain tip, `false` if the transaction was orphaned in a micro-fork.

anyOf.title: TransactionEventSmartContractLog
anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

anyOf.title: TransactionEventStxLock
anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

anyOf.title: TransactionEventStxAsset
anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

allOf.title: PoisonMicroblockTransactionMetadata
allOf.description: Metadata associated with a poison-microblock type transaction

anyOf.title: CoinbaseTransaction
anyOf.description: Describes representation of a Type 3 Stacks 2.0 transaction: Poison Microblock

The nonce counts the number of times an account's owner(s) have authorized a transaction. The first transaction from an account will have a nonce value equal to 0, the second will have a nonce value equal to 1, and so on.

allOf.title: SmartContractTransactionMetadata
allOf.description: Metadata associated with a contract-deploy type transaction. https://github.com/blockstack/stacks-blockchain/blob/master/sip/sip-005-blocks-and-transactions.md#type-1-instantiating-a-smart-contract

source_code.description: Clarity code of the smart contract being deployed

anyOf.title: ContractCallTransaction
anyOf.description: Describes representation of a Type 2 Stacks 2.0 transaction: Contract Call

allOf.title: AbstractTransaction
allOf.description: Anchored transaction metadata. All mined/anchored Stacks transactions have these properties.

allOf.title: BaseTransaction
allOf.description: Transaction properties that are available from a raw serialized transactions. These are available for transactions in the mempool as well as mined transactions.

nonce.description: Used for ordering the transactions originating from and paying from an account. The nonce ensures that a transaction is processed at most once. The nonce counts the number of times an account's owner(s) have authorized a transaction. The first transaction from an account will have a nonce value equal to 0, the second will have a nonce value equal to 1, and so on.

fee_rate.description: Transaction fee as Integer string (64-bit unsigned integer).

sponsored.description: Denotes whether the originating account is the same as the paying account

items.title: PostCondition
items.description: Post-conditionscan limit the damage done to a user's assets

condition_code.title: PostConditionFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A fungible condition code encodes a statement being made for either STX or a fungible token, with respect to the originating account.

condition_code.title: PostConditionFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A fungible condition code encodes a statement being made for either STX or a fungible token, with respect to the originating account.

condition_code.title: PostConditionNonFungibleConditionCode
condition_code.description: A non-fungible condition code encodes a statement being made about a non-fungible token, with respect to whether or not the particular non-fungible token is owned by the account.

anchor_mode.title: TransactionAnchorModeType
anchor_mode.description: `on_chain_only`: the transaction MUST be included in an anchored block, `off_chain_only`: the transaction MUST be included in a microblock, `any`: the leader can choose where to include the transaction.

block_hash.description: Hash of the blocked this transactions was associated with

block_height.description: Height of the block this transactions was associated with

burn_block_time.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when this block was mined

burn_block_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when this block was mined.

parent_burn_block_time.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when this parent block was mined

parent_burn_block_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when this parent block was mined.

canonical.description: Set to `true` if block corresponds to the canonical chain tip

tx_index.description: Index of the transaction, indicating the order. Starts at `0` and increases with each transaction

tx_result.description: Result of the transaction. For contract calls, this will show the value returned by the call. For other transaction types, this will return a boolean indicating the success of the transaction.

hex.description: Hex string representing the value fo the transaction result

repr.description: Readable string of the transaction result

is_unanchored.description: True if the transaction is included in a microblock that has not been confirmed by an anchor block.

microblock_hash.description: The microblock hash that this transaction was streamed in. If the transaction was batched in an anchor block (not included within a microblock) then this value will be an empty string.

microblock_sequence.description: The microblock sequence number that this transaction was streamed in. If the transaction was batched in an anchor block (not included within a microblock) then this value will be 2147483647 (0x7fffffff, the max int32 value), this value preserves logical transaction ordering on (block_height, microblock_sequence, tx_index).

microblock_canonical.description: Set to `true` if microblock is anchored in the canonical chain tip, `false` if the transaction was orphaned in a micro-fork.

anyOf.title: TransactionEventSmartContractLog
anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

anyOf.title: TransactionEventStxLock
anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

anyOf.title: TransactionEventStxAsset
anyOf.description: Only present in `smart_contract` and `contract_call` tx types.

allOf.title: ContractCallTransactionMetadata
allOf.description: Metadata associated with a contract-call type transaction

function_name.description: Name of the Clarity function to be invoked

function_signature.description: Function definition, including function name and type as well as parameter names and types

function_args.description: List of arguments used to invoke the function

anyOf.title: PoisonMicroblockTransaction
anyOf.description: Describes representation of a Type 3 Stacks 2.0 transaction: Poison Microblock
